nodes.text: Merr-Sonn Munitions, Inc., also known as MSM, was one of the three top weapons manufacturers in the galaxy during the time of the New Republic, falling only slightly below BlasTech in total revenues.

The company boasted a huge line of personal and vehicle weapons in addition to artillery and starship weapons, electronic targeting systems, and personal defenses. Subsidiary companies produced everything from heavy artillery to siege weapons. They also rounded out their product line with electronic sights, armor, and other targeting equipment.

Merr-Sonn had been in existence for thousands of years and first began its rise to power during the Great Sith War and the Mandalorian Wars, during both of which the company sold weapons to the Mandalorians. Merr-Sonn did well again during the Clone Wars, providing weapons and equipment to the Confederacy of Independent Systems and the Galactic Republic. The company was neutral during the Galactic Civil War—because its holdings were very widely spread out—and remained highly autonomous during the New Republic era.
At one point in Shatterpoint, Merr-Sonn is misspelled as "Mer-Sonn."
